title: Associação Protectora de Estudantes Pobres
body: It was established in 1894, and its statutes were approved by the Civil Governor on April 26, 1897. Its purpose is to provide subsidies, books, and enrollment for poor students attending high school or special and higher schools.

1894: Establishment of the Associação Protectora de Estudantes Pobres
1897: Approval of the statutes by the Civil Governor
